mainBoard.flavorText: "It had a mouth like that of a great beast, and gnashed its teeth as it strained to reach us. I am thankful it possessed no means of locomotion." —Vervamon the Elder
mainBoard.name: Carnivorous Plant

mainBoard.flavorText: Rather than sheltering her young, the female Fungusaur often injures her own offspring, thereby ensuring their rapid growth.

foreignData.name: Fungusaurus
foreignData.text: Der Fungusaurus erhält am Ende eines Spielzuges, in der er verletzt, aber nicht getötet wurde, eine +1/+1-Marke.

mainBoard.name: Fungusaur
mainBoard.originalText: At the end of any turn during which Fungusaur was damaged but not destroyed, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

rulings.text: If more than one creature damages it at one time, it only gets one counter.

mainBoard.text: Whenever this creature is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

mainBoard.flavorText: The mating habits of Treefolk, particularly the stalwart Ironroot Treefolk, are truly absurd. Molasses comes to mind. It's amazing the species can survive at all given such protracted periods of mate selection, conjugation, and gestation.
mainBoard.name: Ironroot Treefolk

mainBoard.name: Oasis
mainBoard.originalText: Tap to prevent 1 damage to any creature.
mainBoard.text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

foreignData.name: Kraftverlust
foreignData.text: Der Zielspruch wird neutralisiert, wenn dessen Urheber nicht sofort X ausgibt. Er muß alles verfügbare Mana aus seinem Manavorrat und seinen Ländern ausgeben, bis X bezahlt ist; wenn benötigt, kann er auch andere Manaquellen heranziehen.

mainBoard.name: Power Sink
mainBoard.originalText: Target spell is countered unless its caster spends X more mana. Caster of target spell must draw and spend all available mana from lands and mana pool until X is spent; he or she may also spend mana from other sources if desired. If this is not enough mana, target spell will still be countered.

rulings.text: Does not increase the mana cost of the spell. It just requires a separate expenditure in order for it to succeed.

When this spell resolves, you either pay X mana or let your lands become tapped. The lands that become tapped are not “tapped for mana”. If you choose to pay, you may pay the X mana using whatever mana abilities you want to use.

Only lands that actually have mana abilities will get tapped. This includes basic lands and lands with mana abilities printed on them, as well as lands which have been granted a mana ability by some effect.

mainBoard.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that player doesn't, they tap all lands with mana abilities they control and lose all unspent mana.

mainBoard.flavorText: Occasionally a member of the Institute of Arcane Study acquires a taste for worldly pleasures. Seldom do they have trouble finding employment.

foreignData.name: Abtrünniger Zauberer
foreignData.text: {T}: Fügt einem beliebigen Ziel 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

mainBoard.name: Prodigal Sorcerer
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Do 1 damage to any target.
mainBoard.text: {T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target.

foreignData.name: Regeneration
foreignData.text: {G}: Regeneriere die durch diesen Zauber verzauberte Kreatur.

mainBoard.name: Regeneration
mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters attached to that creature.)
{G}: Regenerate enchanted creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)

foreignData.name: Stab des Verderbens
foreignData.text: 3, {T}: Der Stab des Verderbens fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler Deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

mainBoard.name: Rod of Ruin
mainBoard.originalText: {3}, ocT: Rod of Ruin does 1 damage to any target.
mainBoard.text: {3}, {T}: This artifact deals 1 damage to any target.

foreignData.name: Rückruf
foreignData.text: Bringe eine Kreatur auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.

mainBoard.name: Unsummon
mainBoard.originalText: Return target creature to owner's hand; enchantments on target creature are discarded.
mainBoard.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

mainBoard.name: Untamed Wilds
mainBoard.originalText: Search your library for any one basic land and put it into play. This does not count towards your one land per turn limit. Reshuffle your library afterwards.

rulings.text: Because the “search” requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don’t have to find the card if you don’t want to.

mainBoard.text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

mainBoard.flavorText: "What else, when chaos draws all forces inward to shape a single leaf." —Conrad Aiken
mainBoard.name: Wall of Brambles
mainBoard.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{G}: Regenerate this creature.

mainBoard.flavorText: Everybody knows that to ward off trouble, you knock on wood. But usually it's better to make a wall out of the wood and let trouble do the knocking.
mainBoard.name: Wall of Wood

foreignData.name: Wildwuchs
foreignData.text: Wildwuchs erhöht Deinen Manavorrat um ein zusätzliches {G}, sobald Du das verzauberte Land tappst, um damit Mana zu erzeugen.

mainBoard.name: Wild Growth
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever the usual mana is drawn from target land, Wild Growth provides an extra {G}.

rulings.text: The additional mana is not an ability of the land and is not something the land can produce.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}.

foreignData.name: Kormusglocke
foreignData.text: Alle Sümpfe werden zu 1/1 Kreaturen. Sie zählen immer noch als Länder, und Du kannst sie für Mana tappen —allerdings nicht in dem Zug, im dem sie ins Spiel kommen.

sideBoard.name: Kormus Bell
sideBoard.originalText: Treat all swamps in play as 1/1 creatures. Now they can be enchanted, killed, and so forth, and they can be tapped either for mana or to attack.

rulings.text: It affects Swamps controlled by any and all players.
The lands are both lands and creatures at the same time. They are affected by anything that affects either permanent type.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn't matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

sideBoard.text: All Swamps are 1/1 black creatures that are still lands.

foreignData.name: Erwachen der Wälder
foreignData.text: Alle Wälder werden zu grünen 1/1 Kreaturen. Sie zählen immer noch als Länder, und Du kannst sie für Mana tappen - allerdings nicht in dem Zug, in dem sie ins Spiel kommen.

sideBoard.name: Living Lands
sideBoard.originalText: Treat all forests in play as 1/1 creatures. Now they can be enchanted, killed, and so forth, and they can be tapped either for mana or to attack.

rulings.text: A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn't matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

sideBoard.text: All Forests are 1/1 creatures that are still lands.
